# Class References

Source code locations and documentation URLs for further investigation.

| Class | Description | Inherits | Source | Documentation |
|-------|-------------|----------|--------|---------------|
| `ui.card` | Card container | ui.element | [source](https://github.com/zauberzeug/nicegui/blob/main/nicegui/elements/card.py) | [docs](https://nicegui.io/documentation/card) |
| `ui.card_actions` | Actions area in card | ui.element | [source](https://github.com/zauberzeug/nicegui/blob/main/nicegui/elements/card.py) | [docs](https://nicegui.io/documentation/card_actions) |
| `ui.card_section` | Section within card | ui.element | [source](https://github.com/zauberzeug/nicegui/blob/main/nicegui/elements/card.py) | [docs](https://nicegui.io/documentation/card_section) |
| `ui.carousel` | Image/content carousel | ValueElement → ui.element | [source](https://github.com/zauberzeug/nicegui/blob/main/nicegui/elements/carousel.py) | [docs](https://nicegui.io/documentation/carousel) |
| `ui.carousel_slide` | Carousel slide | DisableableElement → ui.element | [source](https://github.com/zauberzeug/nicegui/blob/main/nicegui/elements/carousel.py) | [docs](https://nicegui.io/documentation/carousel_slide) |
| `ui.column` | Vertical flex container | ui.element | [source](https://github.com/zauberzeug/nicegui/blob/main/nicegui/elements/column.py) | [docs](https://nicegui.io/documentation/column) |
| `ui.context_menu` | Right-click context menu | ui.element | [source](https://github.com/zauberzeug/nicegui/blob/main/nicegui/elements/context_menu.py) | [docs](https://nicegui.io/documentation/context_menu) |
